PropertyDefinition.name: Conversion Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Conversion Ratio (number of shares of underlying per ADR)

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Multiplier
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier of average and strike associated with it

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Style of averaging - arithmetic or geometric

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Type of averaging - fixed averaging dates or fixed number of averages

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX : Share Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of fair FX rate against stock price

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fair FX volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIRS

PropertyDefinition.name: Strike
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Strike price associated with the averaging part of the option

PropertyDefinition.name: Strike2
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Strike price associated with the ladder component of the option

PropertyDefinition.name: Barrier Level 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Second barrier level required for double barrier options

PropertyDefinition.name: Barrier Level Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] How the barrier level is quoted I.e spot price or percentage of spot price

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX : Share Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of fair FX rate against stock price

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fair FX volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Fluffiness
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fluffiness - the way the barrier is triggered - Average or Consecutive

PropertyDefinition.name: Forward Start Date
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Forward Start Date - for forward starting options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Number of Points
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of average/consecutive points - Fluffy barrier options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Partial Barrier Date
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Date from which the barrier starts or ceases - Partial barrier options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Partial Barrier Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of partial barrier - Partial barrier options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Payoff
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Amount of the payoff for binary options

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Rebate 2 Paid at Hit
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Value paid at the time of the hit if second barrier level is hit

PropertyDefinition.name: Rebate 2 Paid at Maturity
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Value paid at maturity if second barrier level is hit

PropertyDefinition.name: Rebate Paid at Hit
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Value paid at the time of the hit if first barrier level is hit

PropertyDefinition.name: Rebate Paid at Maturity
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Value paid at maturity if first barrier level is hit

PropertyDefinition.name: Rebate Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of rebate - either at maturity, at hit or none

PropertyDefinition.name: Strike Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Type of strike e.g fx rate or percentage of spot price

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Term structure of volatility of underlying

PropertyDefinition.name: Volatility Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of volatility - either time dependent or time and strike dependent

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Price Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] How the bond price is quoted - clean or dirty

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Type of bond e.g. German Bund, UK Gilt etc

PropertyDefinition.name: Business Day Rule
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Holiday adjustment rule - applied if a target date falls on a non-business day

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Annualized coupon rate for a flat coupon

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Frequency
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Frequency of coupon payments per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Coupon type, flat, stepped or structured

PropertyDefinition.name: Ex-Coupon Days
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number days prior to the coupon after which the purchaser loses the entitlement to the next coupon

PropertyDefinition.name: Face Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Face Value / Nominal value of bond

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Redemption Ccy
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Currency bond redemption amount is paid in

PropertyDefinition.name: Yield Compounding Frequency
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Output yield compounding (Custom bond type only)

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Price Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] How the bond price is quoted - clean or dirty

PropertyDefinition.name: Embedded
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Flag indicating whether the option is embedded in the bond

PropertyDefinition.name: Option Basis
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] How the option is written - on the bond price or the yield

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Fix
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Flag indicating whether to fix the price of the bond - bond future options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Exercise
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Dates and levels for irregular exercise

PropertyDefinition.name: Cap Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Type of capped option eg capped at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Cash Payment Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] How the repayment amount is calculated

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fair price stock volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Hedge price stock volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Ccy
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Currency of bond price and yield

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Repayment Amount
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Amount of repayment at the end of the transaction

PropertyDefinition.name: Repayment Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Fixed interest rate used to calculate repayment at the end of the transaction

PropertyDefinition.name: Business Day Rule
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Holiday adjustment rule - applied if a target date falls on a non-business day

PropertyDefinition.name: Rate Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to be applied to rate data to translate it into decimal form

PropertyDefinition.name: Settlement Delay
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of days to spot date

PropertyDefinition.name: Chooser Date
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] The date at which the buyer decides whether the option is a put or a call

PropertyDefinition.name: Delivery Date 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Delivery Date of the first option

PropertyDefinition.name: Delivery Date 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Delivery Date of the second option

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Expiry 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Expiry date of the first option

PropertyDefinition.name: Expiry 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Expiry date of the second option

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Strike 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Strike / Exercise price of the first option

PropertyDefinition.name: Strike 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Strike / Exercise price of the second option

PropertyDefinition.name: Style 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] American / European etc. for the first option

PropertyDefinition.name: Style 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] American / European etc for the second option.

PropertyDefinition.name: Type 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Call / Put for the first option

PropertyDefinition.name: Type 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Call / Put for the second option

PropertyDefinition.name: Volatility Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of volatility - either time dependent or time and strike dependent

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Initial Strike
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Initial strike price of the option before the first reset

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Acquisition
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Company acquires or is being acquired

PropertyDefinition.name: Cash and Equivalents
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Cash and Equivalents

PropertyDefinition.name: Country
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Country in which company is located

PropertyDefinition.name: Current Assets
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Current Assets

PropertyDefinition.name: Current Liabilities
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Current Liabilities

PropertyDefinition.name: Depreciation and Amortisation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Depreciation and Amortisation

PropertyDefinition.name: Divestiture
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Sale or divestiture of business unit

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividends
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Dividends

PropertyDefinition.name: Interest Expense
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Interest Expense

PropertyDefinition.name: Interest Income
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Interest Income

PropertyDefinition.name: Inventories
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Inventories

PropertyDefinition.name: Liquidation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Liquidation where proceeds are distributed to shareholders

PropertyDefinition.name: Loan Loss Provisions
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Loan Loss Provisions

PropertyDefinition.name: Long Term Liabilities
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Long Term Liabilities

PropertyDefinition.name: Merger
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Agreement to merge two or more companies

PropertyDefinition.name: Name Change
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Name change from old to new

PropertyDefinition.name: Net Income
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Net Income

PropertyDefinition.name: Net Sales
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Net Sales

PropertyDefinition.name: Non Interest Expense
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Non Interest Expense

PropertyDefinition.name: Non Interest Income
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Non Interest Income

PropertyDefinition.name: Non Performing Loans
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Non Performing Loans

PropertyDefinition.name: Operating Income
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Operating Income

PropertyDefinition.name: Share Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The number that the share price figure should be multiplied by

PropertyDefinition.name: Shareholders Equity
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Shareholders Equity

PropertyDefinition.name: Shares Outstanding Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The number that the shares outstanding figure should be multiplied by

PropertyDefinition.name: Spin-Off
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Company gives shares of another to shareholders

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Assets
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Total Assets

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Deposits
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Total Deposits

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Income

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Liabilities

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Loans
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Balance Sheet and Income Statement Items: Total Loans

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Fix
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Flag indicating whether to fix the price of the bond - bond future options only

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Pricing Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Pricing style to be used to price the instrument within XIS

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Term structure of volatility of underlying

PropertyDefinition.name: Volatility Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of volatility - either time dependent or time and strike dependent

PropertyDefinition.name: Additional Conversion Payment
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Additional cash amount payable on conversion

PropertyDefinition.name: Alpha
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Reversion rate for the Extended Vasicek model for IR Vol

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Days
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of averaging days used in the reset calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Multiplier
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier of average price in calculation of conversion price on reset date

PropertyDefinition.name: Averaging Prices
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of prices to be averaged

PropertyDefinition.name: Bid Offer Spread
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Bid to offer spread on the underlying stock price

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Maturity 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] First Zero Coupon Bond Maturity Date for Interest Rate Factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Maturity 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Second Zero Coupon Bond Maturity Date for Interest Rate Factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Price Style
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] How the bond price is quoted - clean or dirty

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Volatility 1
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] First Zero Coupon Bond Price Volatility (%) for Interest Rate Factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Bond Volatility 2
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Second Zero Coupon Bond Price Volatility (%) for Interest Rate Factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Business Day Rule
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Holiday adjustment rule - applied if a target date falls on a non-business day

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Accretion Compounding
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Frequency at which call price accretes

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Accretion Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Percentage rate at which call price accretes

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Accrued
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The accrued interest is received by the holder on bond call. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Confidence Level
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Percentage level of confidence that price will still be over call level after call notice has expired

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Grace Period Days To Trigger
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Minimum days in grace period required above threshold to trigger call

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Notice
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of days given as notice of intention to call

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Parity Over Trigger
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Percentage amount that price needs to exceed call level before call will be announced

PropertyDefinition.name: Call Schedule Linear
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The call schedule is on a daily linear basis. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Calls
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Dates for call provision, call price and trigger price

PropertyDefinition.name: Cap Conversion Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Is the trigger based on current or initial conversion ratio for a reset conversion

PropertyDefinition.name: CB 4 Instrument Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] CB Type - for MONIS CB 4 only

PropertyDefinition.name: CBOpt Recall Spread
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] CB Options: The implied price at which one has an option to purchase the CB

PropertyDefinition.name: CBOpt Recall Spread Basis
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] CB Options: The day count basis used for swap curve & recall spread

PropertyDefinition.name: CBOpt Recall Spread Cmpd Freq
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] CB Options: The compounding frequency for swap curve & recall spread

PropertyDefinition.name: CBOpt Spread Over Treasury
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] CB Options: The spread between the swap curve & the risk-free curve

PropertyDefinition.name: Closing Date
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Date from which first accrual period starts at issue

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Averaging Period
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - Number of days to take average closing prices

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Averaging Period Ending
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - End of conditional conversion averaging period

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Averaging Period Length
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - Length of period (days) to take average closing prices from

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Convert At Maturity
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - Convert at maturity permitted without trigger

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Convert Next Quarter
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - Conversion is permitted in the next calendar quarter

PropertyDefinition.name: CoCo Convert This Quarter
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Conversion - Conversion is permitted in the current calendar quarter

PropertyDefinition.name: Conversion Accrued
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The accrued interest is received on bond conversion. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Conversion Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Is conversion quoted in terms of price, ratio or premium

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Borrowing Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - Estimated borrowing rate from similar bond

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Int By Borrow Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - interest as percentage of CoPay Borrowing Rate.

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Int By Mark Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - interest payment for last period as % of market price.

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Int By Principal
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - interest payment for last period as % of principal.

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Last Mark Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - Market price at end of last averaging period.

PropertyDefinition.name: CoPay Next Payment Due
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Contingent Payment - Whether next payment is due or not?

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Coupon amount as real number for flat coupon

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Forfeit on Call
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The holder forfeits the coupon where call and coupon coincide. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Forfeit on Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The holder forfeits the coupon where conversion and coupon coincide. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Frequency
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Frequency of coupon payments per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Coupon Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Coupon type, flat, stepped or structured

PropertyDefinition.name: Credit Risk Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Whether to activate the credit risk factor

PropertyDefinition.name: Credit Risk Model
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Model to use for credit risk factor calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Credit Spread
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Spread over base rate as a percentage (annual) to reflect credit risk for security

PropertyDefinition.name: Cross Ccy Basis
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Are FX rates bond currency to stock currency or vice versa

PropertyDefinition.name: Days Between Delta Hedging
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of days between hedging the bond

PropertyDefinition.name: DECS Call Feature Active
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The DECS structure has an active call feature. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: DECS Conversion Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion price if conversion is prior to maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: DECS Minimum Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion ratio if conversion is prior to maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: Dividend Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Type of dividend to be used in calculation

PropertyDefinition.name: Enable Calls Feature
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Enable calls feature. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Enable Equity Resets Feature
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Enable equity resets feature. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Enable Interest Rate Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Enable interest rate factor. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Enable Puts Feature
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Enable puts feature. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Enable Transaction Cost Feature
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Enable transaction cost feature. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Equity Reset Last Tranche Converted
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Row index of last mandatory conversion in (Equity Reset) Mandatory Conversion table

PropertyDefinition.name: Equity Reset Mandatory Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Mandatory conversion applicable on reset dates

PropertyDefinition.name: Ex Coupon
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Ex coupon option. False=next coupon included. True=next coupon not included

PropertyDefinition.name: Exchangeable
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Bond converts into stock of another. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Exchangeable Risk Free Ccy
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Risk free currency of exchangable where different from coupon

PropertyDefinition.name: Exchangeable Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Exchangeable into issuers stock or another's on a covered or un-covered basis.

PropertyDefinition.name: Face Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Amount by which bond cash flows are scaled

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair DiscIR : FX Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of fair discount currency interest rate against FX rate

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FwdIR : FX Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of fair forward currency interest rate against FX rate

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX : Share Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of fair FX rate against stock price

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair FX Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fair FX volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Fair Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Fair price stock volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: First Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] First date on which bond can be converted

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge DiscIR : FX Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of hedge discount currency interest rate against FX rate

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge FwdIR : FX Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of hedge forward currency interest rate against FX rate

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge FX : Share Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of hedge FX rate against stock price

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge FX Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Hedge FX volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Hedge Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Hedge price stock volatility, percentage per year

PropertyDefinition.name: Instrument Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Convertible Bond, DECS, PERCS, ELKS, PEPS

PropertyDefinition.name: IR Vol Input Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Input data type for IR Vol

PropertyDefinition.name: Last Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Last date on which bond can be converted

PropertyDefinition.name: Mandatory Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] True=mandatory conversion. False=no mandatory conversion at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: New Shares
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of new shares required on conversion

PropertyDefinition.name: Output Day Basis
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Day count basis for output yields

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Call Conversion Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of shares received on call if call is Fixed Shares

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Call Fixed Shares
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The issuer can call for a fixed number of shares. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Call Variable Shares
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The issuer can call for a variable number of shares. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Higher Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Asset price above which conversion ratio applies pre-maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Issue Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Issue price to be used if conversion is pre-maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Lower Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Asset price below which conversion ratio applies pre-maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Maturity Higher Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Asset price above which conversion ratio applies at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Maturity Issue Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Issue price to be used if conversion is at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Maturity Lower Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Asset price below which conversion ratio applies at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Maximum Maturity Conversion Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Maximum conversion ratio obtainable at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Minimum Maturity Conversion Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Minimum conversion ratio obtainable at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: PEPS Pay Off Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] PEPS pay off, Simple or Complex

PropertyDefinition.name: PERCS Conversion Ratio
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of common shares per PERCS

PropertyDefinition.name: PERCS Convert After Call
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Whether holder can convert after a call. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: PERCS/ELKS Cap Price
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Maximum value that can be obtained when exercising PERCS/ELKS at maturity

PropertyDefinition.name: Perpetual
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The bond is perpetual. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Point Value
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Conversion factor from price to value

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Ccy
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Currency of bond price and yield

PropertyDefinition.name: Price Scaling Factor
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Multiplier to convert quoted price into price currency units

PropertyDefinition.name: Put Accrued Received
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The outstanding accrued interest is received by the holder if he exercises his put. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Put On Default
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The bond is puttable in the event of default. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Recovery Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Percentage of entitlement received in the event of default

PropertyDefinition.name: Recovery Rate Equity Linked
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] The recovery rate payable is dependent on the stock price. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Redemption Ccy
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Currency bond redemption amount is paid in

PropertyDefinition.name: Running Average
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Average spot price over current averaging period

PropertyDefinition.name: Share : Interest Rate Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation of share price against the Interest Rate

PropertyDefinition.name: Sigma
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Volatility for the Extended Vasicek model for IR Vol

PropertyDefinition.name: Soft Call Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Is the trigger based on current or initial conversion ratio for a structured conversion

PropertyDefinition.name: Stochastic Spread Structure
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Credit risk - Stochastic spread structure data

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Conversion
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Dates and levels for structured conversions

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Exercise
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Dates and levels for irregular exercise

PropertyDefinition.name: Structured Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Term structure of volatility of underlying

PropertyDefinition.name: Trading Days
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number days prior to the reset date when averaging starts

PropertyDefinition.name: Trigger Linked To Call
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Whether trigger is linked to the call. True or False

PropertyDefinition.name: Use Flat IR
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Use flat IR input instead of Yield Curve

PropertyDefinition.name: Correlation
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Correlation between asset return of the bond issuer and counterparty

PropertyDefinition.name: Counterparty Liquidity Premium
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Portion of counterparty spread due to liquidity (in bp)

PropertyDefinition.name: Counterparty Recovery Rate
PropertyDefinition.description: [R] Fraction of notional counterparty's bonds are worth after default

PropertyDefinition.name: Liquidity Premium

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Calibrated early Vasicek volatility (used if Volatility Model = Modified Extended Vasicek)

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Calibrated Ho-Lee volatility (used if Volatility Model = Heath-Jarrow-Morton)

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Calibrated infexion time (used if Volatility Model = Modified Extended Vasicek)

PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Calibrated reversion rate (used if Volatility Model = Heath-Jarrow-Morton, Extended Vasicek or Modified Extended Vasicek)

PropertyDefinition.name: Calibrated Vasicek Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Calibrated Vasicek volatility (used if Volatility Model = Heath-Jarrow-Morton, Extended Vasicek or Modified Extended Vasicek)

PropertyDefinition.name: Convexity Kappa
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Mean reversion rate for Hull-White convexity adjustment

PropertyDefinition.name: Convexity Model
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Model used to calculate futures convexity adjustment

PropertyDefinition.name: Convexity Volatility
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Standard deviation used for convexity adjustment

PropertyDefinition.name: Fit Curve Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Curve to which smoothing is applied

PropertyDefinition.name: Fit Order
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Order of polynomal fit (applies only when Fit Curve Method = Polynomial)

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Futures list (applies only when Futures Generation rule = Fixed List)

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures Database
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Default database to use to search for Futures (applies when Futures Generation Rule = Variable List or Template)

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures Delivery Months
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] List of delivery months for futures contracts (applies only when Futures Generation Rule = Variable List)

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures Prefix
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Prefix used in futures instrument item codes

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures Priority
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Rule for selecting short or long term futures when a discount factor can be found from both a short and longer term contract

PropertyDefinition.name: Futures Template
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Template futures list (applies only when Futures Generation Rule = Template)

PropertyDefinition.name: Instrument Precedence Matrix
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Matrix of cross instrument precedence switches

PropertyDefinition.name: Long Futures Date Pattern
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Delivery date sequence of long futures (3M) contracts

PropertyDefinition.name: Long Futures Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Period for which long futures (3M) rates apply

PropertyDefinition.name: Maximum Number of Futures
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Maximum number of futures in chain (applies only when Futures Generation Rule = Variable List or Template)

PropertyDefinition.name: Minimum Lag to Futures
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Minimum number of days to first futures settlement date

PropertyDefinition.name: Preferred Cash Rates Data Source
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Preferred data source to be used for cash rates data (if blank, then first found is used)

PropertyDefinition.name: Preferred Futures Data Source
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Preferred data source to be used for futures data (if blank, then first found is used)

PropertyDefinition.name: Preferred Swap Rates Data Source
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Preferred data source to be used for swap rates data (if blank, then first found is used)

PropertyDefinition.name: Settlement Delay
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Number of days to spot date

PropertyDefinition.name: Short Futures Date Pattern
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Delivery date sequence of short futures (1M) contracts

PropertyDefinition.name: Short Futures Type
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Period for which short futures (1M) rates apply

PropertyDefinition.name: Volatility Model
PropertyDefinition.description: [O] Model to be used to represent the volatility of the interest rate process (uses calibrated values)
